citeinfo.origin: Russian Academy of Science, Dept of Earth Science, Commission of Sedimentary Rock, Institute of Oceanology
citeinfo.title: Recent Sedimentation in the Bering Sea

abstract.p: An International Geophysical Year compilation of sedimentation distribution and composition, mineralogy and petrography of bottom sediments from research cruises to the Bering Sea shelf and basin.

[Reference: Lisitsyn, A. P. (Translated from Russian by N. Kaner, 1969, edited by I. B. Brenner). 1966. Recent sedimentation in the Bering Sea (Protsessy sovremennogo osadkoobrazovaniya v Beringovom more). Jerusalem, Israel Program for Scientific Translations [available from the U.S. Dept. of Commerce, Clearinghouse for Federal Scientific and Technical Information, Springfield, Va. 614 pp.]
This volume may be found at many university libraries.

descript.purpose: To report sedimentation in the Bering Sea.
